location: At Gladstone Hotel - 1214 Queen St. West
name: Fay & Fluffy's Storytime: Reading is FUNdamental - Activist Series
description:
Fay & Fluffy's Storytime: Reading is FUN-damental monthly series is back with all new special guests and a new theme: Activists! While we know that what we do is activist work, this series we wanted to turn the focus on some of our friends who are activists in various communities.

New this session: Each one of our monthly readings will have ASL interpretation.

Our confirmed guests are:

  • Andrew Gurza
  • Syrus Marcus Ware
  • Lezlie Maria Lee Kam

Saturday, Oct 6, 11 am - The 519

Saturday, Nov 10, 2 pm - Queen Books

Saturday, Dec 8, 11am - The 519

January date TBD - Gladstone Hotel

Drag stars Fay Slift & Fluffy Soufflé invite you and the kids in your life to a special event of books and good times. Readings will include Fay & Fluffy’s favourite storybooks, songs, and laughs. We especially want to support families with LGBTQ2S parent(s) and gender variant children. We have a great selection of culturally diverse and inclusive books we look forward to sharing with you in a supportive, welcoming and affirming environment focused on fun!

Everyone is welcome. This is a free event.

The 519 and the Gladstone are accessible for wheelchairs and strollers and have gender-neutral single stall washrooms available. Queen Books has limited accessibility through the back of the store but get in touch with us if needed. Please contact Fay & Fluffy for other accessibility concerns.
